actions.message:
**1) Go to <#532318539932237834> to read about the rules before on starting your life here!
2) Use !commands to get a list of commands.
3) Check out the !ip command to get the servers ip address to join in-game.
4) (extension to 3, just type ASAPGaming.co "or as much as you can fill" and join that way :)
5) **

actions.message:
**1) !purge <number> - staff only
2) !help - anyone
3) !commands - anyone
4) !rules -anyone
5) !logs - stupid/useless command... - anyone
6) !twidiot - shows this weeks idiot - anyone**

actions.message:
**These are the rules of ASAPGaming!**

**1) Don't be abusive**
     *I like to keep my staff secure and unabusive as I can. Some of my staff may fail at that but that aint a problem because you could report at any time*
**2) Read carefully before answering**
     *When someone writes something on a sign ingame, or somewhere, please do read it carefully until further notice to yourself as to you mistaking something wrong from right*
**3) No Cancer, No Spam, No Swift Swearing is allowed!**
     *I got to admit, I do swear all the time but if you do catch someone swearing briefly and swiftly (fast, repeatedly, non stop) then do contact a staff member to take care!*
     *For example "You fucking little cunt, I'm gonna fuck your tiny ass shit fucking mom. I disgust your fucking little ass because your the dumbest cunt I've ever seen in my FUCKING LIFE" is not right what so ever. Fix your life...*
**4) Staff's 1st word is your last word**
     *When a staff member or someone a higher rank than you (donators don't count) tell you to do something immediately, that will be your first and last warning, you better do it or get beat*
**5) Don't send other shit from other servers**
     *My server will be other server content free due to people having to bring shit that don't belong here and give my players another idea of joining that server. I do not resist non asap content*
**6) Learning to be awesome!**
     *:asap: is a wonderous place to be because you get to be friends with others and learn to be respectful. Don't fuck up with the rules and you won't get kicked, banned from the server by staff*

**7) Don't tag staff ranks!**
     *We have the role @Staff that we give to all staff for a reason... tag that not their ranks! STAFF MUST WARN ANYONE FOR USING THE TAG IN #general INSTANTLY*

**MAKING IT EASIER, GOTO <#532318539932237834>**
